name: exploring the images and their nuclei masks
description: Odd rows in the display are the images and Even rows are the masks for the previous row of images. com kaggle docker python For example here s several helpful packages to load in linear algebra data processing CSV file I O e. read_csv Input data files are available in the. most of the content in this function is taken from Example Metric Implementation kernel by William Cukierski. For example running this by clicking run or pressing Shift Enter will list the files in the input directory Any results you write to the current directory are saved as output. This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed It is defined by the kaggle python docker image https github. Next section reads a random subset of 16 images from the training data set and shows them along with their nuclei masks.
script: numpy matplotlib.pyplot read_image_labels plot_images_masks pandas subprocess check_output
